title: 802: $220K BITCOIN IN ’22 IN PLAY - ALL BTC FUNDAMENTALS HAVE STRENGTHENED IN 2021, SAYS MAX KEISER!!
description:
Bitcoin bull Max Keiser predicts $220K BTC in 2022 in play in his recent tweet on Crypto twitter:

"$220k in ‘22 in play. All Bitcoin fundamentals strengthened substantially in 2021. Move of 50% of BTC hashrate out of China - a drop then recoup - without missing a beat in the emission schedule - while removing the China FUD = Greatest Engineering Feat Ever. STACK HARDER"

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
